attributes.action: Allow all children to repeat the school year 2020/2021 because of Covid-19.
attributes.background: Allow children to repeat the school year 2020 / 2021 as they have had so much unfair disruption   they should not be disadvantaged so allowing them to repeat the year will have them a fairer chance

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

All pupils to repeat this current academic year.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
